pull.title: [tests] skipped tests should clean up after themselves

events.body: This runs fine on my local pc but something is causing the tests to hang on Travis. I've pushed a temporary commit to increase travis logging.

rename.from: [tests] skipped tests should clean up after themselves
rename.to: [wip] [tests] skipped tests should clean up after themselves

events.body: Concept ACK, though I'm also puzzled by the travis failures.

events.message: [tests] skipped tests should clean up after themselves

events.body:
930deb9b2c5a8234d430f0a739c97e1fc961ffad passes travis (at least on my fork). I think the earlier failure was perhaps spurious.

This should now be ready for review.

rename.from: [wip] [tests] skipped tests should clean up after themselves
rename.to: [tests] skipped tests should clean up after themselves

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -139,15 +144,18 @@ def main(self):
             self.options.tmpdir = tempfile.mkdtemp(prefix="test")
         self._start_logging()
 
-        success = False
+        success = TestStatus.FAILED
 
         try:
             self.setup_chain()
             self.setup_network()
             self.run_test()
-            success = True
+            success = TestStatus.PASSED
         except JSONRPCException as e:
             self.log.exception("JSONRPC error")
+        except SkipTest as e:
+            self.log.warning("Test Skipped: %s" % e.message)
comments.body: This is info elsewhere, should it really be warning?

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -139,15 +144,18 @@ def main(self):
             self.options.tmpdir = tempfile.mkdtemp(prefix="test")
         self._start_logging()
 
-        success = False
+        success = TestStatus.FAILED
 
         try:
             self.setup_chain()
             self.setup_network()
             self.run_test()
-            success = True
+            success = TestStatus.PASSED
         except JSONRPCException as e:
             self.log.exception("JSONRPC error")
+        except SkipTest as e:
+            self.log.warning("Test Skipped: %s" % e.message)
comments.body:
Yes - this log is replacing the logs in the individual test cases (rpcbind_test.py and zmq_test.py), which are currently warnings.

The reason is that we always want the user to know if a test has been skipped.

comments.body: OK, I see. I thought the log.info below was also logging something similar. This is fine.
